get.description: Returns a paginated list of pools

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (1-based)

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of pools to return per page. Max 1000

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query used to match pools by name, tokens, or address

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Sort results by one or more fields

Format:
- Time-windowed metrics: `<metric>_<window>:<direction>`
- Non-windowed metrics: `<field>:<direction>`

- `direction`: `asc` or `desc`
- `window` (when applicable): `5m` `30m` `1h` `2h` `4h` `12h` `24h`

Available fields:
- Time-windowed metrics: `volume_*` `fee_*` `fee_tvl_ratio_*` `apr_*`
- Non-windowed metrics: `tvl` `fee_pct` `bin_step` `pool_created_at` `farm_apy`

Default: `volume_24h:desc`

Examples:
- `volume_24h:desc`
- `fee_1h:asc`
- `tvl:desc`

parameters.name: filter_by
parameters.description:
Conditions to filter documents by field values

Format: `<expr> [&& <expr> ...]`

Where each expression is: `<field><op><value>`

Allowed fields:
- Numeric: `tvl` `volume_*` `fee_*` `fee_tvl_ratio_*` `apr_*`
- Boolean: `is_blacklisted`
- Text: `pool_address` `name` `token_x` `token_y`

Operators:
- Numeric: `=` `>` `>=` `<` `<=`
- Boolean: `=true` `=false`
- Text:
  - exact match: `=<value>`
  - multi-value OR: `=[value1|value2|...]`

Notes:
- Multiple expressions are combined using logical **AND** (`&&`)
- Whitespace around operators is ignored

Examples:
- `tvl>1000`
- `is_blacklisted=false && volume_24h>=50000`

fee_tvl_ratio.description: Fee TVL ratio in percentage in different timeframes

has_farm.description: Whether the pool has a farm or not

is_blacklisted.description: Flag to indicate whether the pair is blacklisted

permanent_lock_liquidity.description: Permanently locked liquidity inside the pool

protocol_fees.description: Protocol fee data in different timeframes

token_x.description: Token X of the liquidity pair

token_x_amount.description: Amount of token X in the pool

token_y.description: Token Y of the liquidity pair

token_y_amount.description: Amount of token Y in the pool

tvl.description: Total liquidity the liquidity pair holding. Also known as Total Value Locked

parameters.name: volume_tw
parameters.description: Time window to aggregate volume. Returns sum

parameters.name: fee_tvl_ratio_tw
parameters.description: Time window to aggregate fee tvl ratio. Returns Max

get.description: Returns a paginated list of pools that belong to a specific pool group

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (1-based)

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of pools to return per page. Max 100

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query used to match pools by name, tokens, or address

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Sort results by one or more fields

Format:
- Time-windowed metrics: `<metric>_<window>:<direction>`
- Non-windowed metrics: `<field>:<direction>`

- `direction`: `asc` or `desc`
- `window` (when applicable): `5m` `30m` `1h` `2h` `4h` `12h` `24h`

Available fields:
- Time-windowed metrics: `volume_*` `fee_*` `fee_tvl_ratio_*` `apr_*`
- Non-windowed metrics: `tvl` `fee_pct` `bin_step` `pool_created_at` `farm_apy`

Default: `volume_24h:desc`

Examples:
- `volume_24h:desc`
- `fee_1h:asc`
- `tvl:desc`

parameters.name: filter_by
parameters.description:
Conditions to filter documents by field values

Format: `<expr> [&& <expr> ...]`

Where each expression is: `<field><op><value>`

Allowed fields:
- Numeric: `tvl` `volume_*` `fee_*` `fee_tvl_ratio_*` `apr_*`
- Boolean: `is_blacklisted`
- Text: `pool_address` `name` `token_x` `token_y`

Operators:
- Numeric: `=` `>` `>=` `<` `<=`
- Boolean: `=true` `=false`
- Text:
  - exact match: `=<value>`
  - multi-value OR: `=[value1|value2|...]`

Notes:
- Multiple expressions are combined using logical **AND** (`&&`)
- Whitespace around operators is ignored

Examples:
- `tvl>1000`
- `is_blacklisted=false && volume_24h>=50000`

get.description: Returns metadata and current state for a single pool

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Base58-encoded pool address

get.description:
Returns OHLCV candles for a single pool over a time range

**Notes**
- If both `start_time` and `end_time` are provided, candles are returned in the range `[start_time, end_time]`
- If only one of `start_time` or `end_time` is provided, the missing bound is inferred using the selected `timeframe`
- If neither is provided, a default range is used based on `timeframe`

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Base58-encoded pool address

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description:
Candle interval

Allowed values `5m` `30m` `1h` `2h` `4h` `12h` `24h`

If omitted, the API uses `24h`

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description:
Unix timestamp in seconds (inclusive)

If omitted, the API uses a default range based on `timeframe`

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description:
Unix timestamp in seconds (inclusive)

If omitted, the API uses "now" as the end

get.description:
Returns historical volume for a pool aggregated into time buckets

**Notes**
- If both `start_time` and `end_time` are provided, the result covers the range `[start_time, end_time]`
- If only one of `start_time` or `end_time` is provided, the missing bound is inferred using the selected `timeframe`
- If neither is provided, a default range is used based on `timeframe`

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Base58-encoded pool address

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description:
Timeframe

Allowed values `5m` `30m` `1h` `2h` `4h` `12h` `24h`

If omitted, the API uses `24h`

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description:
Unix timestamp in seconds (inclusive)

If omitted, the API uses a default range based on `timeframe`

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description:
Unix timestamp in seconds (inclusive)

If omitted, the API uses "now" as the end

get.description: Returns aggregated protocol-level metrics across all pools
Returns paginated list of closed positions for a given wallet

parameters.name: wallet
parameters.description: Base58-encoded wallet address

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description:
Unix timestamp in seconds (inclusive)

If omitted, the API uses a default range based on end time

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description:
Unix timestamp in seconds (inclusive)

If omitted, the API uses "now" as the end

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of positions to return. Default 10 Max 100

parameters.name: next_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination

parameters.name: pool
parameters.description:
Base58-encoded pool address

Optional filter to filter positions that belong to a specific pool

get.description: Returns all open positions grouped by pool for a given wallet

parameters.name: wallet
parameters.description: Base58-encoded wallet address

parameters.name: pool
parameters.description:
Optional comma-separated list of Base58-encoded pool addresses to filter positions.

- Only positions belonging to the specified pool(s) will be returned.
- Maximum of 50 pool addresses allowed.

Examples:
- Single pool: `pool=8abc...xyz`
- Multiple pools: `pool=8abc...xyz,9def...uvw`
